Package game.core

Class Team

java.lang.Object
game.core.Team
public class Team extends Object
This class represents a team, which contains a list of athletes.

  • Constructor Summary

    Default constructor.

      public void addPlayer(Athlete athlete)
      Adds a new athlete to the team.
      Parameters:
      athlete - The athlete to be added.

    • getNumberInjured

      public int getNumberInjured()
      Counts and returns the number of injured athletes in the team.
      Returns:
      The number of injured athletes.

    • fullStamina

      public void fullStamina()
      Restores stamina to all athletes and set their injury status.

    • changeTeamStamina

      public void changeTeamStamina(int amount)
      Changes the stamina of each team member by a specified amount.
      Parameters:
      amount - The amount to change the stamina by.

    • teamFull

      public boolean teamFull()
      Checks if the team is full.
      Returns:
      True if the team is full (5 athletes), false otherwise.

    • teamNotInjured

      public boolean teamNotInjured()
      Checks if all athletes in the team are not injured.
      Returns:
      True if all athletes are not injured, false otherwise.

    • isTeamFull

      public boolean isTeamFull()
      Checks if the team is full.
      Returns:
      True if the team is full (5 athletes), false otherwise.

    • setWasInjured

      public void setWasInjured()
      Sets the injury status for each injured athlete in the team.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a String representation of the team, including the name and the list of athletes.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      A string representing the team.

    • toDisplay

      public String toDisplay()
      Provides a string representation of the team's name and the names of its athletes.
      Returns:
      A formatted string containing the team's name and its athletes' names.

    • showTeam

      public String showTeam()
      Displays the first four athletes of the team, or fewer if the team has less than four members.
      Returns:
      A string representation of up to the first four athletes of the team.

    • getActiveAthletes

      public List<Athlete> getActiveAthletes()
      Retrieves a list of all athletes in the team who are not injured.
      Returns:
      A list of active athletes.

    • getReserveAthletes

      public List<Athlete> getReserveAthletes()
      Retrieves a list of all athletes in the team who are injured.
      Returns:
      A list of reserve athletes.

    • getInjured

      public String getInjured()
      Creates a string representation of all injured athletes' names in the team.
      Returns:
      A string containing the names of injured athletes.

    • generateEnemyTeamName

      public String generateEnemyTeamName()
      Generates a random team name.
      Returns:
      A string containing a randomly chosen team name.

    • generateEnemyTeam

      public Team generateEnemyTeam(int week)
      Generates an enemy team with specific requirements for player positions.
      Parameters:
      week - The current week, which affects athlete generation.
      Returns:
      The generated enemy team.

    • generateTeam

      public Team generateTeam()
      Generates a new team without specific requirements for player positions.
      Returns:
      The generated team.

    • getForwardAthletes

      public ArrayList<Athlete> getForwardAthletes()
      Retrieves a list of all athletes in the team who are forwards.
      Returns:
      A list of forward athletes.

    • getDefenceAthletes

      public ArrayList<Athlete> getDefenceAthletes()
      Retrieves a list of all athletes in the team who are defenders.
      Returns:
      A list of defender athletes.

    • compareTeams

      public String compareTeams(Team userTeam, Team enemyTeam)
      Compares the defensive and offensive abilities of two teams and determines the result. The method calculates the score for the user's team based on the comparison and reduces stamina for underperforming athletes.
      Parameters:
      userTeam - The user's team to compare.
      enemyTeam - The enemy team to compare.
      Returns:
      The result of the team comparison ("Win" or "Loss").

    • popLastAthlete

      public Athlete popLastAthlete()
      Removes and returns the last athlete from the team.
      Returns:
      The last athlete in the team.

    • randomStatBoost

      public String randomStatBoost()
      Provides a random stat boost to a randomly selected athlete in the team. The method increases either the offense or defense of the athlete by 20.
      Returns:
      A string describing the stat boost applied to the athlete.

    • randomQuit

      public String randomQuit()
      Randomly selects an athlete from the team and removes them from the team. If the selected athlete has not been previously injured, another athlete is randomly selected until an injured athlete is found.
      Returns:
      A string describing the athlete who quit the team.

    • randomJoin

      public String randomJoin()
      Randomly generates a new athlete and adds them to the team, if the team is not already full.
      Returns:
      A string describing the athlete who joined the team, or an error message if the team is already full.
